concept.title: TaskFlow ProSync Application Interface
concept.shortdesc: This topic provides a brief overview of the key elements and features in the TaskFlow ProSync interface.

conbody.p: The TaskFlow ProSync application provides a user-friendly interface designed to streamline your tasks efficiently. The main components of the interface include:

ul.li: Navigation Bar: Located at the top, it allows quick access to major modules.
Dashboard: Presents a customizable overview of your activities.
Toolbars: Feature-specific toolbars for each module simplify actions.
Settings: Accessible through the gear icon, enabling customization and preferences.
